alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Corson and northeastern Dewey Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glencross, or 9 miles southeast of Timber Lake, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glencross around 505 PM MDT. Spring Lake and Trail City around 510 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Little Eagle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for north central South Dakota.
